mapper.select: select qna_idx, user_id, category, auth, qna_title, qna_content, q_del_yn, create_date, update_date from qna where category='N' and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') qna_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') qna_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') qna_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or qna_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1 order by qna_idx desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select count(qna_idx) from qna where category='N' and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') qna_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') qna_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') qna_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or qna_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into qna(user_id, category, auth, qna_title,qna_content , create_date) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{category}, #{auth}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, current_timestamp)
mapper.select: select user_id, pw, email, hp, auth, u_del_yn, u_point, create_date, update_date from user where auth != 'auth_a' and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') auth like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') email like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') u_del_yn like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1 order by user_id desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select COUNT(user_id) from user where auth != 'auth_a' and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') auth like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') email like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') u_del_yn like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1

select user_id, pw, birth, email, hp, hp_emp, intro, profile_img, auth, u_del_yn, u_point, emp_num, success_count, acount, planner_rating, round(avg(planner_rating/rating_cnt), 1) as planner_score, create_date, update_date from user where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update user set pw=#{pw}, birth=#{birth}, email=#{email}, hp=#{hp}, hp_emp=#{hp_emp}, intro=#{intro}, profile_img=#{profile_img}, auth=#{auth}, u_del_yn=#{u_del_yn}, u_point=#{u_point}, emp_num=#{emp_num}, success_count=#{success_count}, acount=#{acount}, update_date=NOW() where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select review_idx, user_id, plan_idx, review_content, planner_rating, r_del_yn, create_date # , update_date from plan_review where user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') review_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') r_del_yn like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1 order by review_idx desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(review_idx) from plan_review where user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') review_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') r_del_yn like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1

select r.review_idx, r.user_id, r.plan_idx, r.review_content, r.planner_rating, r.create_date, r.update_date ,i.r_img, i.r_img_idx from plan_review r inner join review_img i on r.review_idx = i.review_idx where r.review_idx = #{review_idx}

SELECT qna_idx, user_id, category, auth, qna_title, qna_content, qna_answer, qna_pw, answer, q_del_yn, create_date,update_date from qna where category = 'Q' and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') qna_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') qna_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') qna_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or qna_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1 order by qna_idx DESC limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
